column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////New Review March 15 - brought my kids with me today. As we are checking out
column2: my daughter notices the beautiful challah bread along the back wall. She says Mom look at that challah but she pronounces with a "ch" like church. I correct her and the man behind the counter says oh you have to try it! And have us a free loaf! It totally made my daughter's day. Also it was delicious! They kept tearing pieces off in the car. That's how you make a great impression. I always come here but my daughter will always remember that.
